poemsDataJson.list_full: 夕(ゆふ)されば 門田(かどた)の稲葉(いなば) おとづれて 芦(あし)のまろやに 秋風(あきかぜ)ぞ吹(ふ)く
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: When the evening comes,//From the rice leaves at my gate,//Gentle knocks are heard,//And, into my round rush-hut,//Enters autumn's roaming breeze.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Yū sareba|Kadota no inaba|Otozurete|Ashi no maroya ni|Aki-kaze zo fuku
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: あしのまろやに あきかせそふく
poemsDataJson.author: 大納言経信(だいなごんつねのぶ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 夕方の田舎家に稲田を渡って吹いて来る秋風の風情
